title: Untitled (Poesie de Mots, Poesie de Coleurs)
provenance_text:
Ruth Einstein Wilner [1909-2010], New York, NY, until January 2010 [1]; estate of Ruth E. Wilner, January 2010 until February 2011; bequest to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, February 2011 [2].

Notes:
[1]. Ruth E. Wilner (Mrs. J. Alfred Wilner) had resided in Pittsburgh, PA prior to moving to New York City.
[2]. The work was received at the museum in September 2010 and accessioned the following February.
